title: Golab Adineh
text:
Golab Adineh (, born Golab Mosta'an on 13 November 1953) is an Iranian actress.
She is daughter of Iranian novelist Hosseingholi Mosta'an and is married to Iranian actor <a href="Mehdi%20Hashemi%20%28actor%29">Mehdi Hashemi</a>. She has a daughter named Noura Hashemi who is also an actress.
